captions.text: [MUSIC]
Welcome, everyone.

This is a brand new
best class setup video.

I haven't done one of these in a while,
I apologize.

But today, we're gonna be covering one
that a lot of you guys have been asking me

to cover,
that is the ASM one submachine gun.
It's an absolute beast.
It's a load of fun to use.

And if you don't use it already,
then definitely pick up this class and

give it a go, because I know
you'll really, really enjoy it.

If you guys haven't seen any of
the other Best Class Outfit videos,

there's a playlist down below
that will include all of them.

Leave a comment letting me know,
which weapon I should cover next and
make sure I haven't covered it already.

So definitely check out the playlist
without further ado guys,
let's jump into it.

Now normally, I go and
cover the attachments first.

I'm gonna go cover the attachments
in a little bit and

go a little bit more in-depth, but
I think that's the most important part.

We just took those straight
in with the kill streaks.

Kill streaks, they can be
anything you want but personally.

I love that UAV, just to give you
that very quick sort of genuine

appreciation of where the enemies are in
the map after a four kill streak generally

in most game modes, cuz it's a 400
point streak, then the bombing run.
And then finally the, warbird.

The warbird, you can make it even an,
even an aggressor or

a defensive warbird by simply
adding it on for 50 points and

I always do that I make
it an aggressor normally.

So definitely do that with your warbird,
as well.

For perks, we've got lightweight, which is
just gonna make you as mobile as possible.

It's just gonna be really useful as
a submachine gun class, because submachine

gun classes the quickest moving classes
and this is gonna help with that as well.
Perk number two is peripherals.

Peripherals is just gonna you make
you a mini-map just be a square.
It's going to actually be a rectangle.
So, it's gonna be a little bit bigger.

It's gonna allow you to see more and
it's very useful.

Honestly, the mini-map
of who your shooting and
that's why you use peripheral so much.

You need to be looking at that mini-map
a lot and it's really, really useful.

Finally, for perk three, there's a lot of
repetition and fortune in perk three, but

that's Scavenger, so it doesn't run
out of ammo and has Blast Suppressor.

Blast Suppressor just means you do not
appear as a little sort of red flash

when you use your boost jump and
Exo movements on the enemy radars, so
it's very, very useful.

If you're not using it already,
make sure you're doing.
So, it's really, really important.

So now let's jump into the juicy part,
that's the weapon itself.

Now the ASM1 is the standard version
of course, but you can actually get

a version called the Magnitude and that's
what you're seeing in this video here.

Now it's not any, it's not listed
on professional or elite version.
It's simply a standard version.

Now, I believe you unlock it after getting
a certain amount of kills with a standard
ASM1, but honestly, I'm not sure.

But if you use the standard ASM1 enough,
you should automatically unlock this.

I haven't seen many YouTubes talking
about it, but the magnitudes awesome,

because it actually has
an increased range.

There's a submachine gun class,
especially this one has such low recoil.
It can be very effective at longer ranges,

having increased ranges
even more important.

So try and unlock that Magnitude version,
it's gonna help you out a little bit.

So, in terms of attachments,
I've gone for quick draw.

Now, as an SMG class, you're gonna
be getting up close and personal.

A lot of enemies and quick draws
can allow you to ADS quicker or
aim down sight quicker,

which means you can shoot directly into
that enemy as quickly as possible.

And it's really gonna help
you in a lot of gun fights,

especially when you're coming up against
another SM1 user that hasn't got quick

draw, you're gonna have
that slight advantage.
Next up, we've got advanced rifling.
This increases the range even more.

So, it means at those longer distances,
you're gonna be taking less bullets.

And because of how beautiful
the iron sights are on this weapon,

it's pretty much just
like a dead on point.

I often go for extremely long range
kills with this weapon as long as

the enemy isn't shooting with me like
a sniper or an assault rifle and
I often get away with it.

An advanced rifle is again,
just gonna really help.
Definitely use it.
It's an absolutely awesome attachment.

And the final attachment is arguably,
you can, you can switch in and
out while when I was thinking about it.

But the foregrip means that the reduced
it's gonna have reduced recoil,

which is gonna help you for
those cheeky longer range kills.

And it's helped you generally to
lock on to target more effectively.

And I found that this weapon, it feels so
accurate it with, with the foregrip.

But technically, if you get used to
the recoil and you sorta, you know,

can adjust to it an pull down
on your control a little bit, so
the recall isn't quite as much.
You don't have to go to, for forgrips.

You could switch, switch in and out from
maybe laser site to help with your hit

fire, extended mag, so
you have more mags each clip.

And then maybe even draw a magazine,
so you can actually switch in and
out a little bit quicker.
So honestly,

that third attachment is a very important
that you guys can mess around with.

And yeah, whatever you go with
on that third attachment,
it's always going to be great.
So guys trust me.

If you haven't used this weapon already,
go and do so.
I know you'll love it.
I love it.
I have a load of fun.
It works well in all game modes.
The objective, free fall TDM.
It's absolutely awesome.

Not screen here,
you can check out the full class, guys.

So you guys can note it down and
use it yourself.

If you're excited to see another best
class to that video, give it a thumbs up.
And remember,

let me know which weapon I should cover
next down below in the comment section.

On screen here,
you can check out more videos.

Make sure you're not missing
out on anything at all.
So thank you so much for watching.
You guys are absolutely awesome.

I am sure a load of you guys will
do absolutely amazing things with
this weapon.
So thank you so much for watching.

I look forward to seeing you
on another video tomorrow.

So make sure you subscribe and
I'll see you guys then.
